title: kuriyonru kUriDuvAi
sahitya:
kuriyonru kUriDuvAi nI kura mAdE


anupallavi

  veri konraiyaNi Ishan mIdenrum ninaivAnEn viDaiyEri idunALil migha anbODaNaivArO


caraNam    tava mmunivar manaitOrum shArndu piccai vAngi nallAr tangaLuLam tamaik-kavarnda shankhanAm tani mudalvan 
bhavam ozhiya varuvArO paNNiya nal vinaiyumuNDO paramanuDan kUDi onrum bhAggiyam peruvEnO
